name: Solitaire Puzzle -Classic Card
description:
Solitaire Puzzle is a popular and classic card game.This Solitaire game has clear graphics.If you like Windows Solitaire, you will love this solitaire game.
You can move the card with a single tap or drag the card to the right destination. Simple to play, lots of fun. This app is the one you do not want to be without.

Solitaire Puzzle Key Features:
* Crisp & beautiful cards
* Cool Winning Animations
* Custom backdrops & cards
* Draw 1 card （easy mode）
* Draw 3 cards (hard mode)
* Smart hints
* Unlimited undos
* Daily challenges
* Statistics
* Left handed & right handed option
* Auto complete to finish a solved puzzle

If you like solitaire, please enjoy this addictive solitaire puzzle game.
